KS0608119-d-06-25-08-BNSF.Narrative: Y-KCK3012-24 WAS PULLING A CUT OF 8 CARS OUT OF THE RECEIVER.  HELPER WAS ON THE GROUND PROTECTING THE POINT AND FAILED TO CONTROL SPEED OF MOVEMENT, IMPACTING THE SIDE OF Y-KCK2022-24 ON HUMP LEAD 2.NO HAZARDOUS MATERIALS LEAKING.

KS0608122-d-06-28-08-BNSF.Narrative: Y-KCK3163-27A HAD MADE A JOINT ON 761 TRACK AS THEY BEGAN TO PULL THE CUT OF CARS OUT OF THE TRACK WHEN THE CEFX80812 A LOADED CEMENT CAR WENT ON THE GROUND.  AN EXAMINATION OF THE TRACK REVEALED THATMANY TIES NEAR THE END OF THE TRACK IN THE AREA OF THE BUMPER STOPS WERE MISSING OR DAMAGED.  THE MARKS ON THE RAIL INDICATE THAT THE RAIL ROLLED DUE TO WIDE GAGE CAUSED BY POOR TIE CONDITIONS.

KS0608125-d-06-28-08-BNSF.Narrative: YKAN1022-28A DURING NORMAL CLASSIFICATION OPERATIONS THE BNSF 236002 WAS HUMPED INTO TRACK 2048.  THIS WAS AN ARTICULATED INTERMODAL FIVE PACKER.  THE CAR WAS SLOWING DOWN RAPIDLY IN TRACK 3048 WHEN THE DTTX720328 CAUGHT UP TO THE CAR IN 2048 BYPASSING THE COUPLERS AND DERAILING THE CAR.  NO HAZARDOUS MATERIALS LEAKING.
